Hi everyone: I have a Logitech Webcam and I want to know how to adjust brightness on ubuntu 9.04? any easy way to do this?
typically it's done with whatever program you're using for your webcam

logitec as do other webcams uses propiatory drivers that are not available on linux.. so coders have done their best to reverse engineer a lot of them.. they are not always perfect.. Again.. what ever program you're using to view your webcam should have a method of adjusting the brightness.
